post_title: FS - T206 Johnny Kling Hindu PSA 1.5
post_content:
For Sale - T206 Johnny Kling Brown Hindu graded PSA 1.5 $1200 venmo or zelle, $1242 if you prefer pp gs. Great color and condition for a 1.5

Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.

Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.
